name: Padauk with Copper backing earrings
description: These African Padauk earrings are companions to the 'amark/intime' pendant elsewhere on this site. Padauk has a distinctive deep orange-red color and looks stunning with the copper detail. The earrings are .5" x 1" with copper earwires. All BlacKat products are cut & crafted just for you!

name: Black Palm & Black Cherry earrings
description: 'BlackSheep Earrings' are a companion to the BlackSheep necklace, also made from the same two woods, Asian Black Palm & domestic Black Cherry. Each earring is .5" x 1.75" on a bronze earwire with decorative dangles. Black Palm is an extremely useful tree for the people where it grows. Nearly every part of the tree is utilized. The Tamil people refer to it as the Celestial Tree. Every BlacKat piece is cut & crafted with you in mind. Check out the companion necklace.

name: Cardinal Wood & Yellowheart Pendant on Leather Cord
description: "Doors of Your Heart" is the pairing of the deep crimson Cardinal Wood from South America & the bright  golden colored Yellowheart wood from Central America. Both woods are used mostly in the local economies, but Cardinal Wood is sometimes used in musical instruments & cabinetry while Yellowheart can be use in furniture making. The tight grain of these woods means that when used together the first thing you notice is the vibrant color of the piece. Only on closer inspection do you notice that they are wood. The Doors of Your Heart pendant is 1.5"w x 2.5"l on a 20" deerskin leather cord with silver clasp.

name: Brazilian Cherry & Narra pendant on Seude Cord
description: 'Subtle as etc.' is a pairing of the Asian Narra wood & Brazilian Cherry. Both woods are more often seen used as modern flooring material, but the rich tones and even grain makes them beautifully compatible woods for jewelry. 'Subtle' has a sliver of Purpleheart as an inlay. his piece is finished with an 18" brown suede necklace with silver clasp. Every BlacKat piece is cut & carefully given shape, hand sanded & protected with a rub of Danish oil. To protect & polish 'Subtle' coats of a fine wax are lovingly applied. Each of our pieces is designed & handmade just for you! Kat & I hope you will enjoy.

name: Padauk & Yellowheart pendant & silver wire
description: 'smallthings' is made with African Padauk & South American Yellowheart to create a small, but beautiful pendant. The vibrant yellow & the deep orange-red of the Padauk are a lovely pairing. The pendant is 1" x 1" on a silver bail with an 18" silver wire necklace and silver clasp. Every BlacKat piece is cut & carefully given shape, sanded & rubbed with oil to protect & enhance the wood grain. The final step includes several coats of a fine wax lovingly applied. Each BlacKat piece is designed & handmade just for you.

name: Narra & Yellowheart with gold wire necklace
description: 'It's mylife' is the pairing of South American Yellowheart & Asian Narra woods to create a beautiful pendant. Both woods have a wonderful inner glow when finnished. 'It's mylife' has a small Purpleheart inlay where the two meet accenting the subtle line between the woods. This pendant is 1" x 1.25" on a gold bail and 18" wire with a claw clasp & decorative dangle. Every BlacKat pendant is cut & carefully given shape, hand sanded and oiled for protection & to enhance overall appearance. Finally all pieces are lovingly rubbed with a fine wax. Each of our pieces is designed & handmade just for you! Enjoy.

name: Bocote & Mahogany Pendant on Gold Chain
description: 'Harmony' is a beautiful blending of South American Bocote & African Mahogany into an elegant piece of jewelry. The Bocote has spectacular background colors along with the dramatic dark strips. A curving line created by the African Mahogany gives 'Harmony' a graceful look. Every BlacKat piece is cut & carefully given shape, then sanded, oiled for protection & to highlight the grain, and finally hand rubbed & polished with fine wood wax. Each of our pieces is designed & handmade just for you! 'Harmony' is 1.25"w by 2"l and is suspended on an 18" gold snake style chain.

name: Purpleheart & Zebrawood on Gold Ball Chain
description: 'BrassZebra' is a pairing of two of my favorite woods, South American Purpleheart & African Zebrawood. Beautiful, glowing woods, the two are given a brass inlay for a little added interest. An informal 18" gold ball chain has been used to finish the look of 'BrassZebra'. Every BlacKat piece is cut & carefully given shape, sanded, rubbed with Danish oil for protection & to bring out the inner beauty of the wood. The final step is to apply coats of a fine wax to further enhance that glow of these two woods. Each of our pieces is designed & handmade just for you! Hope you Enjoy.

name: Padauk & Zebrawood Triangular Pendant on Gold Chain
description: "(RE)joice" is a pendant made from two African woods, Padauk & Zebrawood. Both woods are generally used for furniture, flooring & in construction and are considered abundant & secure. They have a pronounced grain and beautiful inner glow that makes pairing these wood a natural. The Zebrawood, like its namesake has dark stripes on a light background, and this hallmark pattern makes designing with it such a joy. Every BlacKat piece is cut & carefully given shape. Several steps of hand sanding precedes a bath of Danish oil & then coats of fine wax. The pendant is 1"w x 2.5"l set on an 18" gold snake style chain.

name: Yellowheart & Narra pendant on Seude Necklace
description: 'Sun(rise)' is the joining of the Asian Narra wood & South American Yellowheart. A graceful curving line pairs the two woods into a single beautiful pendant.  'Sun(rise)' is on a 24" suede cord with a silver clasp to finish the 1.25" x 2.75" piece. Every BlacKat pendant is cut & carefully given shape. Several steps of hand sanding & oil rubbing precedes coats of a fine wax lovingly applied. Each BlacKat work is designed & handmade just for you! Me & the Kat hope you enjoy.

name: Black Palm & Black Cherry on Bronze Chain
description: 'BlackSheep' is domestic Black Cherry with Asian Black Palm. The Black Palm is a widely cultivated & an economically important wood throughout SE Asia. Every part of the tree is utilized for something, thatching, mats, baskets, food & a type of sugar. So important among the Tamils, that the Black Palm is called the Celestial Tree. 'BlackSheep' is a beautiful blending, the Cherry is the same coloration as the background of the Palm, the dark black adding drama & contrast. Each of our BlacKat pieces is designed & handmade just for you! 'BlackSheep' is 1.25"w x 1.75"l, on a bronze colored 18"chain.

name: Padauk with Copper Inlay on Leather Cord
description: 'amark/intime' is from a beautiful piece of West African Padauk inlaid with copper. Padauk has a bold & distinctive coloration in the red & red-orange range with deep dark lines of grain. Not surprising, this wood is used for furniture making. 'amark/intime' is on a simple 20" length of black deerskin leather. Every BlacKat piece of jewelry is cut & carefully given shape. Several steps of hand sanding is followed by a soaking with Danish oil and completed with coats of a fine wax. Each of our pieces is designed & handmade just for you! Me & the Kat hope you enjoy.

name: Purpleheart & Rosewood on Leather Cord
description: 'once in a lifetime' is a pairing of two similar woods, the South American Purpleheart & Asian Rosewood. The Purplheart tree when first cut shows a light brown wood that turns a brilliant rich purple when exposed to light. Indian Rosewood has a deeper purple-brown tone, a perfect compliment to the Purpleheart. 'once in a lifetime' is 2" x 2.5", and finished with a 20" black deerskin leather cord & silver clasp. Every BlacKat piece is cut & carefully given shape, before being sanded and oil rubbed. Finally several coats of a very fine wax is applied to your jewelry. Each of our pieces is designed & handmade just for you!

name: Purpleheart on Silver Ball Chain
description: '3HoleHeart' is made from the South American Purpleheart wood with three aluminum tubes on on an 18" silver colored ball chain. Purpleheart is a fascinating wood that when first cut shows a light brown color. Upon exposure to light the wood transforms to the beautiful rich deep purple that you see. Every BlacKat piece is cut & given shape, sanded, bathed with oil to enhance the grain and protect, and finally lovingly rubbed with a fine wax. Each of our pieces of wooden jewelry is designed & handmade just for you! Me & the Kat hope you enjoy.

name: Purpleheart, Walnut & Ash Pendant on Silver Chain
description: "very Young" is is bonding of two popular domestic woods, Black Walnut & Ash, with the distinctive exotic wood Purpleheart. When first cut, the heartwood of the Purpleheart tree is dull brown in color. Upon exposure to light it turns to the rich deep purple that gives the wood its name. This wood is from Central & South America is most often used in construction, cabinetry, flooring & making billiard-cues. very Young is 1"w x 2.5"l on an 18" silver snake style chain. Each of our pieces is designed & hand made just for you!

name: Zebrawood, Walnut & Cardinal Wood on Gold Chain
description: 'Current' is a combination of South American Cardinal Wood, African Zebrawood & domestic Walnut into a flowing triangular shape. The Walnut is compatible with the dark strips of the Zebrawood & the Cardinal Wood contrasts the two dramatically. Every BlacKat piece is cut & carefully given shape, sanded, then oiled for protection & to enhance the beauty of the wood. Finally, each design is hand rubbed with several coats of fine wax. Each of our pieces is designed & handmade just for you! 'Current' is 1.25"w x 2.5"l, & hangs on an 18" gold snake style chain.
